column5: I had a guide out of Temple Bay a few years ago and I know he left Temple Bay but was wondering if he is still guiding on the lake. I think they called him Big John wore a cowboy hat and smoked big cigars. I may be in the Dryden area this summer and may want to fish with him if he still wets a line. Thanks
I seem to recall that he went to North Shore, but I am checking with my friends in the area.
I text a friend John Jakobs still around
John is prov1800 on this site is he not? You can PM him for information or he most likely will see your post> wmd
You're thinking John Gibson.....he now lives in Vermilion Bay...
when john Gibson left temple bay he went over to evergreen lodge and will be there this year.I just talked to him a couple of days ago.
